page.title: 03Kirkconnel: Census facts
page.content: Kirkconnel and Kelloholm (which lies in the adjacent block) cannot be separated since the latter is an expansion of Kirkconnel. Census 1981 Pop. 2851 L.A. and Housing Assoc. housing 857 Private housing 80 Registrar stats. 1984 Births 35 Deaths 32 Marriages 18 Over the 16yrs. since Fauldhead colliery closed and the subsequent closure of the other small mining operations in the area the pop. has fallen from around 5000 to its present level which if current trends are maintained, is likely to prevail. The former N.C.B. houses of Kellobank are rapidly being bought and renovated by young couples.This is an encouraging development. Employment is stable but no growth is forseen. Contributer:D.Hamilton,Dist.Cncl.Offcr
